Pitch challenge


Following a successful inaugural edition showcasing eight promising startups, the Healthcare Innovation Pitch Challenge returns to fuel another year of innovation and collaboration.

Calling global healthcare companies and startupsâ€”this is your opportunity to shine.

Why apply

Participants will have the opportunity to pitch their ideas and receive expert feedback from a panel of judges and industry leaders.

The top three teams will gain access to:
- Recognition during the symposium
- Exclusive networking opportunities with investors and strategic partners
- Potential follow-up discussions or funding introductions



Apply to pitch

Important Dates

Application Deadline

Tuesday, 31 March 2026

Notification of Acceptance

Sunday, 31 May 2026

Pitch Date

Thursday, 9 July 2026

Important Notes

Attractive cash prizes for the top 3 teams

Global healthcare companies and startups are welcome to apply

Shortlisted teams will present onsite at the sysmposium

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Who should apply?
Startups or companies working on innovative healthcare or AI-driven sotluions are welcome to apply. We accept early-stage, growth-stage, and research-based ventures.
Is there a fee to participate?
No, participation in the pitch challenge is free of charge. However, teams are responsible for their own travel and accommodation if attending the event.
How do I register, and what is required in the application?
All applicants must register by completing the online registration form and submit the following:
- A pitch deck (PDF or PowerPoint, max file size of 100Mb)
- A pitch video (Length: up to 3.5 minutes, format and size: .mp4, .avi, max file size of 1 GB)
How long is the pitch?
Each team will have 4 minutes to pitch, followed by 2-3 minutes of Q&A with the judges.
When is the application deadline?
Application deadline: 31 March 2026;
Notification of acceptance: 31 May 2026;
Pitch: 9 July 2026.
What is the judging criteria?
Judges will evaluate the pitches based on
- Innovation and uniqueness
- Impact on healthcare
- Feasibility and scalability
- Team Capability
- Clarity of presentation
What are the benefits of participating in the Healthcare Innovation Pitch Challenge?
Opportunity to pitch and receive professional feedback from the judging panel and industry experts. Top 3 teams will receive:
- Recognition at the symposium.
- Networking opportunities with investors and partners.
- Potential follow-up meetings or funding introductions.
How many members can attend the symposium?
Up to two members from the same company will receive complimentary access to HAI 2026. Additional members may register to attend the event.
Can I submit more than one application?
Founders should only submit one application per company.
Is may application confidential?
Yes, all applications are kept confidential within the organising team and shared only with the judging panel as required for their evaluation.
